languages.text: "Как бы то ни было, теперь мы в тупике. Мы надеялись, что, отыскав злоумышленников, найдем и логово выродков".
"Be that as it may, we have hit a dead end. We hoped that exposing the culprits would lead us to the aberrations' lair."
languages.original_text: "Как бы то ни было, теперь мы в тупике. Мы надеялись, что, отыскав злоумышленников, найдем и логово выродков".

traits.locale_text: "Be that as it may, we have hit a dead end. We hoped that exposing the culprits would lead us to the anathemas' lair."
"Be that as it may, we have hit a dead end. We hoped that exposing the culprits would lead us to the anathemas' lair."
"Be that as it may, we have hit a dead end. We hoped that exposing the culprits would lead us to the aberrations' lair."
"Be that as it may, we have hit a dead end. We hoped that exposing the culprits would lead us to the anathemas' lair."
"Be that as it may, we have hit a dead end. We hoped that exposing the culprits would lead us to the aberrations' lair."
"Be that as it may, we have hit a dead end. We hoped that exposing the culprits would lead us to the aberrations' lair."
"Be that as it may, we have hit a dead end. We hoped that exposing the culprits would lead us to the aberrations' lair."
"Be that as it may, we have hit a dead end. We hoped that exposing the culprits would lead us to the aberrations' lair."

languages.text: «En cualquier caso, hemos llegado a un punto muerto. Esperábamos que revelar a los culpables nos condujera a la guarida de las aberraciones».
languages.original_text: "Be that as it may, we have hit a dead end. We hoped that exposing the culprits would lead us to the aberrations' lair."

traits.locale_text: «En cualquier caso, hemos llegado a un punto muerto. Esperábamos que revelar a los culpables nos condujera a la guarida de las aberraciones».

languages.text: 「それはともかく、袋小路です。犯人を暴けば、忌まわしきものの隠れ家にたどり着けるものと思っていました」
languages.original_text: "Be that as it may, we have hit a dead end. We hoped that exposing the culprits would lead us to the aberrations' lair."

traits.locale_text: 「それはともかく、袋小路です。犯人を暴けば、忌まわしきものの隠れ家にたどり着けるものと思っていました」

languages.text: “但无论如何，调查还是走到了死胡同。我们本以为找到罪魁祸首之后，就能找到那些怪物的巢穴。”
languages.original_text: "Be that as it may, we have hit a dead end. We hoped that exposing the culprits would lead us to the aberrations' lair."

traits.locale_text: “但无论如何，调查还是走到了死胡同。我们本以为找到罪魁祸首之后，就能找到那些怪物的巢穴。”

languages.text: "Wie dem auch sei, wir sind womöglich in eine Sackgasse geraten. Wir hatten gehofft, die Täter zu enttarnen würde uns zum Versteck der Abscheulichkeiten führen."
languages.original_text: "Be that as it may, we have hit a dead end. We hoped that exposing the culprits would lead us to the aberrations' lair."

traits.locale_text: "Wie dem auch sei, wir sind womöglich in eine Sackgasse geraten. Wir hatten gehofft, die Täter zu enttarnen würde uns zum Versteck der Abscheulichkeiten führen."

languages.text: « Eh bien, nous voilà dans une impasse. Nous espérions trouver l'antre des aberrations en démasquant les coupables, peine perdue. »
languages.original_text: "Be that as it may, we have hit a dead end. We hoped that exposing the culprits would lead us to the aberrations' lair."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, nous voilà dans une impasse. Nous espérions trouver l'antre des aberrations en démasquant les coupables, peine perdue. »

languages.text: "Her hâlükârda kendimizi çıkmazda bulduk. Suçluları ifşa etmenin bizi sapkının inine yönlendireceğini umduk."
languages.original_text: "Be that as it may, we have hit a dead end. We hoped that exposing the culprits would lead us to the aberrations' lair."
